name: Era of Legends: Dragon Discord
description:
Era of Legends — the next generation mobile MMORPG!

Fans of swords and magic! Embark on an epic adventure across the boundless world of the F2P MMORPG Era of Legends. Discover a captivating story, take on refreshing adventures, and try the unique gameplay features.

Bombard hordes of demons riding a griffin or hack your way through them controlling a massive robot. Collect magic beasts and send them into battle. Raiding or saving the continent of Eminoor from the forces of Evil alongside your relatives is priceless!

Era of Legends combines the best features of mobile gaming and the key qualities of the top MMORPGs. A vast explorable world filled with thousands of secrets, hundreds of class combinations and magic beasts, daring battles, and fascinating graphics. Hello, new wondrous life!

Key features:

Free exploration

The world of Era of Legends is so immense it will take time to explore even from the height of a griffin's flight. It is the perfect place to set foot into the unique zones, solve mysteries, hunt for hidden treasures, and make history by yourself or alongside your friends!

Tactical flexibility and diverse battles

Eight classes with unique specializations — is good. Plenty of all kinds of attack, defense or support magic beasts — is excellent. Combining class and magic beasts abilities — is fantastic, thousands of variations for every occasion and adversity.

A collector's heaven

Era of Legends has mounts, magic beasts, hero skins, and pretty much anything a true collector would crave.

Best genre qualities in one game

Clans, dungeons, holidays, server legends, remarkable events, raids, intriguing quests, sparkling online stories to tell in the real world. Era of Legends is massive and offers the players nothing less.

Colorful design and graphics

It's not the flying what makes the world so engaging. It's the reason to get off the mount after spotting a suspicious-looking meadow. Unusual architecture, unforgettable zones, and secluded spots full of curious for an observant explorer details — in Era of Legends amazing stories can be found under a rock. Literally.
